Faster than Light Connection

Your Universal Galactic Network

An international space research organisation that is involve to discover the new way to connect you

"Houston, We’ve Had a Problem"

COMMUNICATION DIFFICULTIES

Due to the communication with Mars already possess the technology of the speed of light, a message from Mars to Earth has only about 22 minutes to happen, however, for NASA this speed is still not enough because they make difficult the operations in guiding robots and research cars on the planet.
Besides, we have to think beyond Mars, what will be the next steps in 30.40 years? Do we have enough technology to make communications with other planets or solar systems?
For this communication to occur in an efficient way, faster mechanisms are needed, which means extrapolating the theory of general relativity proposed by Albert Einstein.

To Mars and Beyond

WELCOME TO THE FUTURE

We from the Minnoctlevis team present FTLC (Faster Than Light Connection) as a unique and powerful way to establish communications between Earth and Mars through tachyon bombing, an efficient mechanism that can be used in the future not only for signal transmissions to Mars, but also for the rest of the Solar System and beyond.

Interplanetary connection

HOW WILL THIS CONNECTION WITH THE PLANETS BE GIVEN?

Connecting to other planets may be possible more quickly when using satellites as bombing points of Táquions particles.
Below is an example of how this event would take place:

  1. The data, sent from the Earth to a near satellite at a specific point in space through laser beams.
  2. The satellite would interpret the information and pass it on employing the bombardment of tachyon particles.
  3. Particles of tachyon would be bombed for many coordinations from the satellite, through space.
  4. When satellite millions of kilometers away would pick up the signal through a special quantum panel, which would interpret the variations of tachyons that pass by the panel, identifying traces of left by the waves and translating that in reliable data.
  5. After interpreting, the satellite orbiting another planet would pass the information to the planet using lasers beams once more.
  6. When the information arrived at the other planet safely, a quantum machine linked in a tower on Mars would send a ping to another one on Earth using quantum entanglement technology, advising that the information did or didn't arrive without being corrupted.
FTLC main components

TACHYONS AND NEUTRINOS - WAVES OF ENERGY GENERATED BY COSMIC EXPLOSIONS

Tachyons

Tachyons are hypothetical and special particles that break the light barrier and reach the temporal tissue (maybe a reason why it's very difficult to see them?!), was initially proposed by the German physicist Arnold Sommerfeld and after studied by several others physicists over the years, we can find traces of Táquions particles in various fields of quantum physics.
According to the Special Relativity Theory, although it is not possible that a particle with mass can be accelerated until it reaches light speed, it is possible, the existence of a particle that may already be faster than the light itself (Reason which established the theory of the Tachyons existence).
Although all attempts to detect Tachyons are unsuccessful, the idea of ​​their existence may be used in this project, we may have to ignore the causality but... That's fine.A special theorized property about Tachyon is that the more energy it loses, the faster it moves towards infinity, which would make it reach far distant places faster than in any other particle until it gets so fast that nothing could detect it, a feature that I think, could be very well used in the area of ​​communication.

Neutrinos

Neutrinos are elemental particles that, according to a failed experiment carried out by CERN, could be faster than light by 0.000000006x.The result of that experiment was subsequently overturned by CERN itself when claiming flaws in the experiment, and announcing that neutrinos could probably just reach the speed of light since they could not identify if it indeed exceeds.

ENERGY WAVES GENERATED BY COSMIC EXPLOSIONS

Gama Ray

Gamma Ray Explosions, generated through cosmic explosions, may have the capacity to be even faster than the speed of light, however ... it takes something like two big stars collapsing into a black hole or the shock of something like neutron stars for that to happen so...

QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT

Quantum entanglement is a phenomenon that happens when a pair or group of particles is generated, interact, or share some kind of link between them, and what affects one have also effect in other, no matter how far they could be from each other.
A funny feature is that when entanglement between some particles happens, it was detected that they could even share the physical state, making one disappear when another appears what is usually called Quantum teleportation.
Although scientists are skeptical about any transmission of the information at faster-than-light speed using this quantum entanglement, lest's explore the idea...
